sen.j: 身頃の肩山を後ろにずらして襟肩回りを髱の形や位置にあわせてU字型、あるいはV字型に後ろに引いて着る。
sen.e: After katayama (the top of shoulder) is slid backward, the collar at the back of the neck is bent into a U- or V-shape to fit the tabo and pulled lower in alignment with the tabo.
